page.title: 13Shalfleet Church
page.content: {The Rev. Ryall}met us in the church with his dog, a labrador called Honey. He answered our questions about the church. There is a service{every Sunday}at 11a.m. About 40 people come. The Sunday School meet at the same time elsewhere. Some weeks there is an 8o'clock {Communion Service}and there is a {Family Service}once a month when about 80 people come. The services last about 45 minutes. There is a church choir. The Rev. Ryall showed us things inside the church. The oldest thing in the church is the{font.}It is 600 years old.They keep the plug somewhere safe in case someone takes it. The church is open for people to come in at any time.
